inapplicable.help: Active <area> elements must have alternative text

inapplicable.help: aria-braille attributes must have a non-braille equivalent

inapplicable.description: Ensure every ARIA button, link and menuitem has an accessible name
inapplicable.help: ARIA commands must have an accessible name

inapplicable.help: ARIA dialog and alertdialog nodes should have an accessible name

inapplicable.description: Ensure every ARIA input field has an accessible name
inapplicable.help: ARIA input fields must have an accessible name

inapplicable.description: Ensure every ARIA meter node has an accessible name
inapplicable.help: ARIA meter nodes must have an accessible name

inapplicable.description: Ensure every ARIA progressbar node has an accessible name
inapplicable.help: ARIA progressbar nodes must have an accessible name

inapplicable.description: Ensure role="text" is used on elements with no focusable descendants
inapplicable.help: "role=text" should have no focusable descendants

inapplicable.description: Ensure every ARIA toggle field has an accessible name
inapplicable.help: ARIA toggle fields must have an accessible name

inapplicable.description: Ensure every ARIA tooltip node has an accessible name
inapplicable.help: ARIA tooltip nodes must have an accessible name

inapplicable.description: Ensure every ARIA treeitem node has an accessible name
inapplicable.help: ARIA treeitem nodes should have an accessible name

inapplicable.description: Ensure the autocomplete attribute is correct and suitable for the form field
inapplicable.help: autocomplete attribute must be used correctly

inapplicable.description: Ensure <blink> elements are not used
inapplicable.help: <blink> elements are deprecated and must not be used

inapplicable.description: Ensure buttons have discernible text
inapplicable.help: Buttons must have discernible text

inapplicable.description: Ensure <dl> elements are structured correctly
inapplicable.help: <dl> elements must only directly contain properly-ordered <dt> and <dd> groups, <script>, <template> or <div> elements

inapplicable.description: Ensure <dt> and <dd> elements are contained by a <dl>
inapplicable.help: <dt> and <dd> elements must be contained by a <dl>

inapplicable.description: Ensure every id attribute value used in ARIA and in labels is unique
inapplicable.help: IDs used in ARIA and labels must be unique

inapplicable.description: Ensure table headers have discernible text
inapplicable.help: Table header text should not be empty

inapplicable.description: Ensure form field does not have multiple label elements
inapplicable.help: Form field must not have multiple label elements

inapplicable.description: Ensure <frame> and <iframe> elements with focusable content do not have tabindex=-1
inapplicable.help: Frames with focusable content must not have tabindex=-1

inapplicable.description: Ensure <iframe> and <frame> elements contain the axe-core script
inapplicable.help: Frames should be tested with axe-core

inapplicable.description: Ensure <iframe> and <frame> elements contain a unique title attribute
inapplicable.help: Frames must have a unique title attribute

inapplicable.description: Ensure <iframe> and <frame> elements have an accessible name
inapplicable.help: Frames must have an accessible name

inapplicable.description: Ensure that HTML elements with both valid lang and xml:lang attributes agree on the base language of the page
inapplicable.help: HTML elements with lang and xml:lang must have the same base language

inapplicable.description: Ensure elements have alternative text or a role of none or presentation
inapplicable.help: Images must have alternative text

inapplicable.description: Ensure image alternative is not repeated as text
inapplicable.help: Alternative text of images should not be repeated as text

inapplicable.description: Ensure input buttons have discernible text
inapplicable.help: Input buttons must have discernible text

inapplicable.description: Ensure <input type="image"> elements have alternative text
inapplicable.help: Image buttons must have alternative text

inapplicable.description: Ensure that every form element has a visible label and is not solely labeled using hidden labels, or the title or aria-describedby attributes
inapplicable.help: Form elements should have a visible label

inapplicable.description: Ensure every form element has a label
inapplicable.help: Form elements must have labels

inapplicable.description: Ensure the banner landmark is at top level
inapplicable.help: Banner landmark should not be contained in another landmark

inapplicable.description: Ensure the complementary landmark or aside is at top level
inapplicable.help: Aside should not be contained in another landmark

inapplicable.description: Ensure the contentinfo landmark is at top level
inapplicable.help: Contentinfo landmark should not be contained in another landmark

inapplicable.description: Ensure the document has at most one banner landmark
inapplicable.help: Document should not have more than one banner landmark

inapplicable.description: Ensure the document has at most one contentinfo landmark
inapplicable.help: Document should not have more than one contentinfo landmark

inapplicable.description: Ensure <marquee> elements are not used
inapplicable.help: <marquee> elements are deprecated and must not be used

inapplicable.description: Ensure <meta http-equiv="refresh"> is not used for delayed refresh
inapplicable.help: Delayed refresh under 20 hours must not be used

inapplicable.description: Ensure <object> elements have alternative text
inapplicable.help: <object> elements must have alternative text

inapplicable.description: Elements marked as presentational should not have global ARIA or tabindex to ensure all screen readers ignore them
inapplicable.help: Ensure elements marked as presentational are consistently ignored

inapplicable.description: Ensure [role="img"] elements have alternative text
inapplicable.help: [role="img"] elements must have an alternative text

inapplicable.description: Ensure the scope attribute is used correctly on tables
inapplicable.help: scope attribute should be used correctly

inapplicable.description: Ensure elements that have scrollable content are accessible by keyboard
inapplicable.help: Scrollable region must have keyboard access

inapplicable.description: Ensure select element has an accessible name
inapplicable.help: Select element must have an accessible name

inapplicable.description: Ensure that server-side image maps are not used
inapplicable.help: Server-side image maps must not be used

inapplicable.description: Ensure all skip links have a focusable target
inapplicable.help: The skip-link target should exist and be focusable

inapplicable.description: Ensure summary elements have discernible text
inapplicable.help: Summary elements must have discernible text

inapplicable.description: Ensure tabindex attribute values are not greater than 0
inapplicable.help: Elements should not have tabindex greater than zero

inapplicable.description: Ensure the <caption> element does not contain the same text as the summary attribute
inapplicable.help: Tables should not have the same summary and caption

inapplicable.description: Ensure that each cell in a table that uses the headers attribute refers only to other cells in that table
inapplicable.help: Table cells that use the headers attribute must only refer to cells in the same table

inapplicable.description: Ensure that <th> elements and elements with role=columnheader/rowheader have data cells they describe
inapplicable.help: Table headers in a data table must refer to data cells

inapplicable.description: Ensure lang attributes have valid values
inapplicable.help: lang attribute must have a valid value

inapplicable.description: Ensure <video> elements have captions
inapplicable.help: <video> elements must have captions

inapplicable.description: Ensure <video> or <audio> elements do not autoplay audio for more than 3 seconds without a control mechanism to stop or mute the audio
inapplicable.help: <video> or <audio> elements must not play automatically

passes.description: Ensure the order of headings is semantically correct
passes.help: Heading levels should only increase by one

ancestry: html > body > main > section:nth-child(1) > div > div:nth-child(1) > h1:nth-child(2)
html > body > main > section:nth-child(2) > div > div:nth-child(1) > h2:nth-child(1)
html > body > main > section:nth-child(2) > div > ul:nth-child(2) > li:nth-child(1) > h3:nth-child(1)
html > body > main > section:nth-child(2) > div > ul:nth-child(2) > li:nth-child(2) > h3:nth-child(1)
html > body > main > section:nth-child(2) > div > ul:nth-child(2) > li:nth-child(3) > h3:nth-child(1)
html > body > main > section:nth-child(3) > div > div > h3:nth-child(1)
